name: Mahjong for Thanksgiving
description:
==============How To Play==============

Mahjong for Thanksgiving is a free mah jong game based on a classic Chinese game.(also known as Shanghai Mahjong, Taipei Mahjong, Kyodai, Mahjong Trails, or Shanghai mahjongg)

The aim of the game is to remove all the playing tiles in the fastest time, while trying to achieve the highest score. Each tile has a Thankgiving themed picture on it, there are 38 different image in total. Tiles must be selected and matched with other tiles of the same picture. Whenever you match two tiles, they both disappear, and when all tiles have disappeared the game is over.

With this tile arts, Mahjong for Thankgiving is 1 of the most unique mah-jongg game in google play

==============Features==============

- Addictive gameplay

- Totaly free

- 55 Game Levels, new levels in every week

- 12 backgrounds.

- Unique tile art

- Thankgiving

- Shuffle

- Hint
